Original Text: \Eホーホーホッホーが現れた！

\E美味しそうな果実を見つけた！
\c[7]休憩回数+1\c[0]
Better translation:
\E\font[3]\f[18]\-[2]We found some delicious looking fruits! 
\c[7]+1 rest attempt\c[0]!

Original Text: \Eこれは…！道端で\c[7]えっちな本\c[0]を拾った！
Better translation: \E\font[3]\f[18]\-[2]This is...! I picked up a \c[7]naughty book\c[0] on the side of the road!

Original Text: \Eいい感じの物陰で休息した。
Better translation: \E\font[3]\f[18]\-[2]We took a rest in a nice secluded spot.

Original Text: \Eこれは…！道端で\c[7]コンドーム\c[0]を拾った！
Better translation: \E\font[3]\f[18]\-[2]This is...! I picked up a \c[7]condom\c[0] on the side of the road!

Original Text:
\E同士！
…こ、ここに罠を仕掛けておきましょう！
\E一行はさらに先へと進んだ…

\Eお弁当を差し入れてもらった…！
\c[7]休憩回数+1\c[0]
Better translation:
\E\font[3]\f[18]\-[2]We got a lunchbox from Yukari-san...! 
\c[7]+1 rest attempt\c[0]!

Original Text: \E強い日差しに体力を奪われる…。
Better translation: \E\font[3]\f[18]\-[2]The intense sunlight is draining our energy...

Original Text: \E難所を抜けるまで休憩出来なさそうだ…。
Better translation:
\E\font[3]\f[18]\-[2]It seems unlikely that we'll be able to rest until 
we make it through this challenging part...

Original Text: \Eなんだかお尻がムズムズする…。
Better translation: \E\font[3]\f[18]\-[2]My butt feels itchy for some reason...

Original Text:
\Eグレムリンに食料を台無しにされた…。
\c[7]休憩回数-1\c[0]

Better translation: \E\font[3]\f[18]\-[2]We made it through the group of monkeys!
